title: Carrot-Beet Sloppy Joes
sub_head: This Joe recipe cuts the serving of meat to 1 ounce per personâ€”down from the typical 6. You could cut the meat out entirely, but by leaving some beef in the mix you still get a meaty flavor base and some protein.
body: To explore and search through all our recipes, check out the new WSJ Recipes page.
